Docs.summary: Adds settings that define behavior to a custom data service.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether projection requests should be accepted.
Docs.value: if projection requests are supported; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Projection requests are made by using the `$select` query option.
